types:type.name: accounts

%dw 2.0
type accounts = Array<{| accountID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, country: String, street: String, state: String, name: String, city: String, postal: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"accountID\\\":5039,\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Maxine Mule\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"},{\\\"accountID\\\":5043,\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Max Mule\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: example-accounts

%dw 2.0
type example_accounts = Array<{| accountID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, Acc_Type: {| "type": String |}, address: {| street: String, city: String, state: String, country: String, postal: String |}, Air_miles: Number {"typeId": "int"}, creation_date: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"accountID\\\":5039,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Maxine Mule\\\",\\\"Acc_Type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Personal\\\"},\\\"address\\\":{\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"},\\\"Air_miles\\\":2344,\\\"creation_date\\\":\\\"2016-05-28T12:41:41.090Z\\\"},{\\\"accountID\\\":2311,\\\"name\\\":\\\"jagadeesh gorripati\\\",\\\"Acc_Type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Personal\\\"},\\\"address\\\":{\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"},\\\"Air_miles\\\":2455,\\\"creation_date\\\":\\\"2016-05-28T12:41:41.090Z\\\"}]"}
